entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -37.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 06:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -37.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -41.4°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
